author: legogal
title: Extremely cute tent and accessories!
review:
Picked this up last week at the Raleigh LEGO store because it is just adorable and the idea of kids playing with camping gear is at the top of our list. It fits well with the other outdoor sets from the Friends' line. If you can't take your child camping, you can at least pretend you are playing outside with this accessory pack. 

It is a very quick build and quite easy to assemble with the only bricks forming the tent floor. The tent itself is free standing and just attaches to the four bley pieces extending from the tent floor. The other accessories fit in well with the one pan stove and lantern being perfect. All they left out was a picnic table with benches or chairs. Where is Stephanie supposed to sit? And they forgot the bug spray, water purifier, sleeping bag and a hat with mosquito netting. And would Stephanie leave town without her cell phone and laptop...seriously?

For 15US, these other items could have been added. The price seems a bit high, but our family likes camping. So it was an easy decision using a 5US credit on my rewards account. 

If this pushes your little ones towards camping, buy more than one! Thanks LEGO for pushing outdoor adventures, especially those for girls.
